item.title: Hindustan Zinc Eyes Uranium Mining As India Opens Nuclear Sector To Private Players
item.description: The Indian government is set to open up the nuclear sector to private players in a bid to bring in investments to expand capacity by 2047.

item.title: Indian Markets Extend Gains; Midcaps Outperform, Reliance, Auto Stocks Rally
item.description: Energy, auto, FMCG, and textile stocks led the gains. Retail sentiment shifted to bullish on Stocktwits.

item.title: Relief For Retail Investors: SEBI Maintains 35% Quota In Big IPOs
item.description: The market regulator had earlier suggested lowering the retail allocation from 35% to 25% for IPOs exceeding ₹5,000 crore.

item.title: DoorDash’s Deliveroo Deal Could Clear European Regulatory Hurdle As EU Opts For Simplified Review
item.description: DoorDash plans to expand its foodhold in the European market with the Deliveroo deal, which was announced last month.

item.title: Why Cybersecurity Vendor Palo Alto’s Stock Is Rallying In Today’s Premarket
item.description: The company exited fiscal year 2025 with an acceleration in remaining performance obligation — a key operational metric, and surpassed the $10 billion...
